text: This is a list of feature films originally released and/or distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (to include MGM/UA Entertainment Co., MGM/UA Communications Co., MGM–Pathe Communications Co. and MGM/UA Distribution Co.). This list does not include films from United Artists before it merged with MGM (except for co-productions), nor does it include other studios that MGM acquired (such as Orion Pictures, The Samuel Goldwyn Company, Cannon Films or Atlantic Releasing). The pre-May 1986 Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer catalogue is owned by Turner Entertainment Co., a division of WarnerMedia, with distribution handled by sister company Warner Bros. ==1920s== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- ! scope="col" style="width:130px;"| Release date !
